links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: Lim n -> infinity a(n)/a(n-1) = Phi / C = 2.31651242917313... where Phi is the golden ratio and C the positive root of x^4+x^3+-2x^2-2x-1 (C=0.6984784404...) - _Benoit Cloitre_, Aug 13 2002
mathematica: nxt[{a_,b_}]:={b,Floor[GoldenRatio*a]+Floor[GoldenRatio*b]}; Transpose[ NestList[ nxt,{0,1},30]][[1]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 24 2016 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
